description: Try our easy to follow Nick's Flying Kite recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fruit salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Blueberry,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Nick's Flying Kite Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Ask an adult to help slice the watermelon and rockmelon into triangular shapes.
Arrange the triangles of watermelon and rockmelon in the shape of a kite on a plate.
Thread blueberries on to a piece of string to make the tail of the kite.
